downloadDescription: How to integrate Windows applications into the Healthcare Desktop Automated Build process in accordance with current best practices.
detailsSection: This guidance provides recommendations on how to integrate Windows applications into the Healthcare Desktop Automated Build process in accordance with current best practices. The purpose of this guidance is to assist a healthcare organization with integrating its applications into the automated build process in a reliable, repeatable and manageable way. The content you are downloading is part of a large collection of technology offerings aligned with the Microsoft Connected Health Platform to help you optimize information and communication technology infrastructures for health organizations. You can access this collection and additional resources including contact information from the Health ICT Resource Center found at www.microsoft.com/healthict.
installInstructionSection: Please open this file in Adobe Acrobat Reader
